ygData.subject: Re: Fiery Avenger
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL i know its paladin only.. im saying it shouldnt be paladin only? nah = it shouldnt be paladin only.. i know it is ... From: Simon
ygData.messageBody:
LOL i know its paladin only.. im saying it shouldnt be
"paladin only? nah" = it shouldnt be paladin only.. i know it is
